description: It is a two-way mirror that places a data display on Amelia's vanity mirror.

encouragement: It'll be great to see everyone at DesignCraft today!
Remember to eat some fresh fruit today!

description: Person signs in and sees their catered version of the news article about DesignCraft.
Don talks to a few people about working at DesignCraft and looks up data on them.
Rate the match/compatibility between two people.

text: It was sad to see him in such a bad place

description: shows someone who logs in a feed of information from social media and news sites then tracks how you browse around to finally show you what data was collected and who would use it

feed.event: Jane just liked your facebook post

description: This game is simple a list of rights you slowly have to give up from terms of service until you disagree
This is fully pre-processed but should take images and repaint them in the style of paintings we have in a bank
recommender system for you that you do quick questions against
quotes are shown and the person who said it can decide to own up or not

Joe Mitchell: I love that little dog you are kissing
Barbecues kind of freak me out
Meat is only good when smoked or dried
If Taco Bell advertises to me again, I'll die laughing
Poncho Malley: I've been to way to many things to believe this shit
Tara Yook: I hope someone chokes on one of these cinnabuns
Does anyone else think the new Colbert show sucks?

description: show user images infused with friends whose faces swapped or Amelia is swapped in and ask them about their memories
Ask questions to a soothsayer using categories then selecting which question you want answered

horoscope.question: what will your future love life look like?
horoscope.response: you are seeking love so you'll find it

computed.question: what is your average relationship time
computed.response: you have averaged 14.5 months per relationship.

description: you have to decide which numbers about you and the world are real and what's been fudged

facts: You have up voted 12,000 reddit posts
You've said the word 'pasta' at least 137 times online.
false: You have looked at Jamie McMatthews profile 24 times
The current government debt is $32 trillion.

description: porn and sexy photos are shown to you that are matched from faces we analyzed within your known network. At the end, youre told who you are most attracted to.
Lights off booth where you listen to and feel music in a chair with transducers
